live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
29561.summary: Some customers in the Kensington-Cedar Cottage area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29561.title: Nov 24 - Vancouver (Kensington-Cedar Cottage) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
